DFRPackagesFile.Name: Official addons (languages, icon sets etc.) for D-Fend Reloaded

Language.Name: Turkish
Language.Description: A Turkish language file for the 0.9.x series.

Language.Name: Portuguese-BR
Language.Description: A Brazilian Portuguese language file for the 0.9.x series.

Language.Name: French
Language.Description: An improved version of the French language file for the 0.8.x series.

Language.Name: Polish
Language.Description: An updated Polish language file for the 0.9 pre-releases (0.8.9 to 0.8.13).
